scripts.css: node-sass scss -o css && postcss css/*.css -u autoprefixer -u cssnano --no-map -r
scripts.-------js: uglifyjs ./dist/js/index.js -o ./dist/js/index.min.js | uglifyjs ./dist/js/regis.js -o ./dist/js/regis.min.js | uglifyjs ./dist/js/regis.form.js -o ./dist/js/regis.form.min.js | uglifyjs ./dist/js/regis.form.2.js -o ./dist/js/regis.form.2.min.js | uglifyjs ./dist/js/regis.form.3.js -o ./dist/js/regis.form.3.min.js | uglifyjs ./dist/js/regis.form.4.js -o ./dist/js/regis.form.4.min.js | uglifyjs ./dist/js/regis.format.js -o ./dist/js/regis.format.min.js | uglifyjs ./dist/js/announce.js -o ./dist/js/announce.min.js
scripts.-------compile: npm run css | npm run js
